Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates different input rules in the client side
    Author:
    Manuel Colorado

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean doubleValidator(java.lang.String test)
      Verifies if the string is a value that can be converted to a Double number
      static void setDoubleValidation(java.lang.String test, javafx.scene.control.TextField node, java.lang.String tooltip)
      Sets up a listener to a TextField passed by parameter that will check for changes in the TextProperty of the node and change the field between red and green depending if the value is valid
      static void setGreen(javafx.scene.Node n)
      Sets the border of the node passed by parameter green (passed validation)
      static void setRed(javafx.scene.Node n)
      Sets the border of the node passed by parameter red (failed validation)
      static void setRed(javafx.scene.Node n, java.lang.String tooltip)
      Sets the border of the node passed by parameter red (failed validation) and set up a tooltip, if compatible
      static void setSignedIntValidation(java.lang.String test, javafx.scene.control.TextField node, java.lang.String tooltip)
      Sets up a listener to a TextField passed by parameter that will check for changes in the TextProperty of the node and change the field between red and green depending if the value is valid
      static void setStringValidation(java.lang.String test, int min, int max, javafx.scene.control.TextField node, java.lang.String tooltip)
      Creates a listener in a TextField node that will check changes and validate using the StringValidator such changes
      static boolean stringValidator(java.lang.String test, int min, int max)
      Verifies if the input matches the length specified by parameter
      static boolean unsignedIntValidator(java.lang.String test)
      Verifies if the string is a value that can be converted to a positive Integer

    • Method Detail

      • stringValidator

        public static boolean stringValidator(java.lang.String test,
                                      int min,
                                      int max)
        Verifies if the input matches the length specified by parameter
        Parameters:
        test - String value that will be tested by size
        min - Minimum string size that will be checked
        max - Maximum string size that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the string size matches the values passed by parameter, false otherwise

      • setStringValidation

        public static void setStringValidation(java.lang.String test,
                                       int min,
                                       int max,
                                       javafx.scene.control.TextField node,
                                       java.lang.String tooltip)
        Creates a listener in a TextField node that will check changes and validate using the StringValidator such changes
        Parameters:
        test - the string that will be tested in the validator
        min - minimum size of the string that will be tested
        max - maximum size of the string that will be tested
        node - the node that contains the string that will be tested
        tooltip - the tooltip that will be set up in the node if validation fails

      • doubleValidator

        public static boolean doubleValidator(java.lang.String test)
        Verifies if the string is a value that can be converted to a Double number
        Parameters:
        test - String value that will be tested
        Returns:
        true if the string can be parsed into a Double, false otherwise

      • setDoubleValidation

        public static void setDoubleValidation(java.lang.String test,
                                       javafx.scene.control.TextField node,
                                       java.lang.String tooltip)
        Sets up a listener to a TextField passed by parameter that will check for changes in the TextProperty of the node and change the field between red and green depending if the value is valid
        Parameters:
        test - The text that will be tested if it's double or not
        node - The node that will be changed if the test fails
        tooltip - A string representing the tooltip that will be added to the node

      • unsignedIntValidator

        public static boolean unsignedIntValidator(java.lang.String test)
        Verifies if the string is a value that can be converted to a positive Integer
        Parameters:
        test - String that will be evaluated
        Returns:
        true if the string can be parsed to an Integer greater than 0, false otherwise

      • setSignedIntValidation

        public static void setSignedIntValidation(java.lang.String test,
                                          javafx.scene.control.TextField node,
                                          java.lang.String tooltip)
        Sets up a listener to a TextField passed by parameter that will check for changes in the TextProperty of the node and change the field between red and green depending if the value is valid
        Parameters:
        test - The text that will be tested if it's positive integer or not
        node - The node that will be changed if the test fails
        tooltip - A string representing the tooltip that will be added to the node

      • setRed

        public static void setRed(javafx.scene.Node n)
        Sets the border of the node passed by parameter red (failed validation)
        Parameters:
        n - A JavaFX node

      • setRed

        public static void setRed(javafx.scene.Node n,
                          java.lang.String tooltip)
        Sets the border of the node passed by parameter red (failed validation) and set up a tooltip, if compatible
        Parameters:
        n - A JavaFX node
        tooltip - A string of text that will be included as node tooltip

      • setGreen

        public static void setGreen(javafx.scene.Node n)
        Sets the border of the node passed by parameter green (passed validation)
        Parameters:
        n - A JavaFX node
